column2:
"Fantastic, really...It was so fast that I
couldn't see what had happened but I
felt it 2 ~ 3 times, right?"

"Your quick work was completed so fast
that the eyes did not have time to blink."

"Oops! It's not the time to be struck by
admiration."

"Let me continue on with the training
when the images are still clear in my
head!"

"すげーや、マジで……
何が起きてるのかわかんねー瞬間が
２、３回あった気もするぜ？"

"目にも止まらぬ早業ってのは
おたくみてーなのを言うんだろうな。"
"おっと！　感心してる場合じゃねーな。"

"イメージが焼き付いてるうちに
オレも修行に出掛けてくるぜ！"
